segments.text: I see the sunlight streaming in through the window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels almost surreal; everything outside looks calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the water is overflowing, creating a small puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman in the dress seems blissfully unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that dish; it’s like nothing else exists to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glance at the boy; he looks so determined as he reaches into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised he hasn’t toppled over yet; that stool looks ready to give out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl, standing beside him, looks excited, her palm open for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, to shout for them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a strange blend of innocence and danger in this little kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
